logicalNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b(1)) a.1 ^= !b
logicalNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b(1)) a[0].1 ^= !b[0]

logicalNegationOfAccessOnValueOfDimensio.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a.1 ^= !b[1].1
logicalNegationOfAccessOnValueOfDimensio.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a[0].1 ^= !b[1].1

logicalNegationOfUnaryExpression.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(2)) a.0 += !(a.2:3 > b)
logicalNegationOfUnaryExpression.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(2)) a[0].0 += !(a[0].2:3 > b[0])

bitwiseNegationOfBitAccessWithUnknownInd.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(1)) for $i = 0 to (#a - 1) do b ^= ~a.$i rof
bitwiseNegationOfBitAccessWithUnknownInd.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(1)) for $i = 0 to 3 step 1 do b[0] ^= ~a[0].$i rof

bitwiseNegationOfBitrangeAccessWithKnown.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(2)) b ^= ~a.1:0
bitwiseNegationOfBitrangeAccessWithKnown.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(2)) b[0] ^= ~a[0].1:0

bitwiseNegationOfBitrangeAccessWithUnkno.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(2)) for $i = 0 to (#a - 2) do b ^= ~a.$i:($i + 1) rof
bitwiseNegationOfBitrangeAccessWithUnkno.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), out b(2)) for $i = 0 to 2 step 1 do b[0] ^= ~a[0].$i:($i + 1) rof

bitwiseNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(1)) a.0 ^= ~b
bitwiseNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(1)) a[0].0 ^= ~b[0]

bitwiseNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(4)) a ^= ~b
bitwiseNegationOfVariableAccessWithBitwi.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(4)) a[0] ^= ~b[0]

bitwiseNegationOfAccessOnValueOfVariable.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a ^= ~b[1]
bitwiseNegationOfAccessOnValueOfVariable.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a[0] ^= ~b[1]

bitwiseNegationOfUnaryExpression.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(2)) a.0:1 ^= ~(b - a.2:3)
bitwiseNegationOfUnaryExpression.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(4), in b(2)) a[0].0:1 ^= ~(b[0] - a[0].2:3)

bitwiseNegationOfBinaryExpression.inputCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a ^= ~((b[1] + b[0]) * b[2])
bitwiseNegationOfBinaryExpression.expectedCircuit: module main(inout a(2), in b[3](2)) a[0] ^= ~((b[1] + b[0]) * b[2])
